alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 10:08PM CDT until May 11 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... West central Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1008 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Slaughterville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Southeastern Norman, Noble, Slaughterville, Pink, Tribbey, Etowah, Brooksville, Macomb, southern Lake Thunderbird, and Little Axe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
